sentences.sentence: He won the most titles ever on Australian Championships Mens Singles.
sentences.translation: 他是澳大利亚锦标赛史上获得男单冠军最多的选手。

sentences.sentence: In 1905 was created a tournament named The Australasian Mens Championships.
sentences.translation: 1905年，一个叫做澳大拉西亚男子锦标赛的联赛诞生。

sentences.sentence: That is why I was glad to have such a great panel for the mens short program in Vancouver.
sentences.translation: 这就是为什么我庆幸温哥华冬奥男单短节目裁判团是很强势的。
